text: Hessa gish wotadarati ba garssan “Gishan oonna gakkanakoone errana mala iza bolla exxa yeggana attin dakooko” gida. Hessika hanidday kase “Ta mayoo istti gishshetii ekkida, ta bollara mayza mayoza bolla exxa yegiida” getetida geesha maxaafa qaalay poleistana malasa. Wotararatikka heesa oothida.
